body:
@devel should work with all options.

Releases don't work with ~catalyst
See https://gitlab.kitware.com/sensei/sensei/-/merge_requests/240 for the fix for develop.

Releases work only with paraview 5.7 and 5.6
See https://gitlab.kitware.com/sensei/sensei/-/merge_requests/239 for the fix for develop (which works with 5.9)
title: sensei: add versions and fix dependencies
